sources.title: Dual Alibi
sources.description: "Dark, griping and memorable” “Excellent film, heartily recommend it” “Fine and unusual mystery drama” “Brilliant film!” (IMDB reviews quotes). A unique suspense drama staring Herbert Lom in the dual role of twin trapeze artists. Good supporting cast and adequate production values. IMDB rating 7. Written and directed by Alfred Travers. Released in 1947 (UK only). Complete print.

sources.title: Dual Alibi (restored) (1947, crime, imdb score: 6.8)
sources.description: Dual Alibi is a 1947 British drama film directed by Alfred Travers and starring Herbert Lom , Phyllis Dixey and Terence De Marney . It is a film noir . It was made by British National Films at Elstree Studios .

metadata.Plot: Twin trapezists fall out over a lottery ticket and a worthless woman, but later extract a unique revenge.
metadata.Writer: Alfred Travers, Stephen Clarkson, Vivienne Adès
metadata.Actors: Herbert Lom, Phyllis Dixey, Terence de Marney
